articles.title: North-South Working Contact Made
articles.content:
North-South Working Contact Made
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The north-south working contact for the revision of contracts on the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) was made in Kaesong on Friday.
					 At the contact the north side said that the working contact was arranged to keep the work in the KIZ on a normal footing as it finds itself in a very difficult situation owing to the recently changed inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The north side chided the south side for deciding to fully participate in the PSI right after the contact began, without making any sincere approach towards the contact, and zealously joining in the "sanctions".
					
					 The south side's behavior cannot be interpreted otherwise than a deliberate and premeditated act to deny even the work in the KIZ, the only lever for cooperation between the north and the south, and throw an obstacle in the way of the working contact, the north side charged, urging the south side to refrain from doing anything to bedevil the situation contrary to the desire and aspiration of the nation and take a sincere stance towards the work in the KIZ and the working contact aimed at improving it.
					
					 As regards the issue of revising the contracts on the KIZ the north side recalled that at the previous contact it clarified its principled stand on the renegotiating the preferential steps concerning the KIZ and advanced specific proposals on land use tax, wages, taxes, etc. 
					
					 Noting that the north side advanced the proposals, taking into full consideration the practices done in the special economic zones in other countries and the south side and the political, economic and military peculiarities of the KIZ, in particular, the north side said that one may say it is the authorities of the south side that get the biggest profits from the KIZ from a political, economic and military point of view. 
					
					 The north side stressed that if the south side truly wishes to see the KIZ operating on a stable basis, it should affirmatively accept the issues and innovative proposals put forward by the north side and positively respond to them.
					
					 Then followed a speech by the south side.
					
					 The north side called to task the south side for laying hurdles in the way of the working contact on the work in the KIZ, evading its responsibility and duty and creating complexity by raising an issue irrelevant to the revision of the contracts and urged it to sincerely approach the discussion of issues with a correct attitude and stand.
					
					 Both sides agreed to have the next working contact on July 2.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Military Provocation Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Military Provocation Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- On June 15 the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors at an "event" held at the second fleet headquarters of the puppet army to "commemorate the anniversary of the West Sea incident" unhesitatingly let loose such bellicose remarks as "annihilation" and the "third West Sea skirmish".
					 Earlier, the puppet minister of Defense at a "meeting of ministers in charge of diplomacy and security" dared cry out for "resolute counteraction" against someone, echoing Lee Myung Bak's outbursts calling for "strengthening a war posture" over the non-existent "provocation by the north".
					
					 In another development, the puppet warmongers have massively beefed up warships including destroyers and guided missile high speed craft and troops in areas along the boundary line in the West Sea of Korea and conducted madcap military maneuvers targeted against the DPRK, escalating tension.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in information bulletin No. 951 released on Friday denounced this as an extremely dangerous military provocation to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The military provocation perpetrated by the puppet group of traitors clearly indicates that it is inching close to the phase of an actual war after going beyond that of simple hysteria or the farce to mislead the public opinion of south Korea, the information bulletin said, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK has never considered the Lee group as a party it can deal with as they are nothing but stooges and cannon fodder of the U.S.
					
					 If the puppet warmongers persist in the military provocation to push the situation to the brink of a war, defying repeated warnings of the DPRK it will mete out limitless and merciless retaliatory blows to them.

articles.title: 45th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Celebrated
articles.content:
45th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Celebrated 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given at theatres in Pyongyang and local areas Friday to celebrate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 A music and dance performance was given by artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre while a concert by artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 The State Folk Art Troupe gave an art performance at the Central Youth Hall and the orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall. 
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as female solo and chorus "Song Devoted to Comrade Kim Jong Il", orchestras "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Thunder on Jong Il Peak", male solo "May the Era of Workers' Party Prosper" and cello concert "We Started from Scratch".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il who created the noble history of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence and is leading the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation to victory under the uplifted banner of Songun with his great idea and extraordinary leadership.
					
					 Narrative pieces and acrobatic performance given by the State Theatrical Troupe and the Pyongyang Circus gave revolutionary optimism and pleasure to the people in the capital city celebrating the significant day. 
					
					 Similar performances were also given at theatres in local areas such as Jagang, North Hamgyong, Kangwon and South Phyongan provinces. 
					
					 Art performances were also given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the youth league and by art groups at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Held
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place on June 18 at Chongjin Port to celebrate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of Kiribati-flagged ship Hongru.
					
					 Describing Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee as a historic event that opened up an era of great changes for the WPK and the Korean people, speakers at the meeting noted that he has developed the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type, an ever-victorious powerful party.
					
					 He has built up the WPK as the mother party devotedly serving the people, they said, and went on: What is noteworthy in the history of his leadership over the WPK is that he strengthened the WPK into the powerful guiding forces for the revolutionary cause of Songun by carrying forward the history and traditions of the Korean revolution pioneered with arms and thus provided a firm guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They stressed that victory and glory are always in store for the Korean people as they are led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other dancing places of Pyongyang on Friday to celebrate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The venues of the events were pervaded with youth and students' joy of commemorating the historic day Kim Jong Il started leading the WPK. 
					
					 They turned into seas of cheerful dancers as the song "Confetti of the Best Wishes" reverberated far and wide. 
					
					 Youth and students enthusiastically danced to the tune of "Let's Sing of the Pride of Having the General in High Esteem" and "It's Guerrilla-Style Work, Appearing in the East and then in the West," etc.
					
					 They continued merry dances to the tunes of such pleasant and dynamic songs as "May the Era of the Workers' Party Prosper" and "Oh, the Party, You are Our Joy."
					
					 The festive atmosphere picked up when youth and students presented jovial dances to the tunes of songs "The Road I Take as I Had Wished," "Songun Nilliri" and "Hullari." 
					
					 Similar dancing parties of youth and students took place in Sinuiju, Wonsan, Hamhung and other provincial capitals, cities and county seats on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Queen of UK
articles.content:
Greetings to Queen of UK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Queen Elizabeth II on the occasion of her official birthday, the national day of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
					 Kim in the message wished her good health and happiness.

articles.title: Minutes of DPRK-Sino Talks on Oceanic Scientific and Technological Cooperation
articles.content:
Minutes of DPRK-Sino Talks on Oceanic Scientific and Technological Cooperation
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The minutes of talks on the oceanic scientific and technological cooperation between the DPRK Hydro-Meteorological Service and the State Oceanic Administration of China were signed in Pyongyang on Friday. 
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the DPRK Hydro-Meteorological Service led by Vice-Director Ryu Pong Chol and from the opposition side were members of the delegation of the State Oceanic Administration of China headed by Deputy Administrator Chen Lianzeng and a staff member of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Opens
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Opens
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The 12th national Taekwon-Do championship for Jongilbong Cup was opened with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Friday.
					 The championship brought together over 700 players selected from Taekwon-Do teams and at least 10 units including schoolchildren's palaces and halls. Players will compete in Taekwon-Do, Paduk and Korean wrestling games.
					
					 Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, said in an opening speech called on all the players to fully display strong metal power and technology they have acquired in their day-to-day trainings at the championship and thus achieve good results and contribute to the development of the nation's martial arts technique. 
					
					 Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, was present at the opening ceremony.

articles.title: Performance of "The Flower Girl" Given
articles.content:
Performance of "The Flower Girl" Given
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A performance of the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl", an immortal classic masterpiece, was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theater on June 19 to celebrate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.  
					 The revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl", an operatic version of a drama of the same title created and performed in the 1930s, is a monumental masterpiece that serves as the genuine textbook of the struggle and life for the revolutionaries. It shines as an eternal treasure of human culture. 
					
					 The performers, through the fate of Kkotpun and her family, made successful artistic representation of the revolutionary truth that tears and sympathy could not save the destiny of her family and herself, to say nothing of that of the nation, and the only way-out is to fight with the class enemies.
					
					 Appreciating the performance were leading officials of the state and the army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Information Workers of Trade Union Organizations Tour Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Information Workers of Trade Union Organizations Tour Area of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Information workers of primary organizations under the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea from across the country made a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu between June 12 and 17.
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung standing at the Victorious Battle Pochonbo Memorial Tower, in the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, on the shore of Lake Samji, at the Monument to Victory in Battles in Musan Area and in the Chongbong Bivouac and before the mosaic depicting the peerlessly great persons standing in the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Upon arriving in Pochonbo from Hyesan, they visited the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum and went round the Command Post of the Pochonbo Battle, the Police Post and the Sub-county Office of the Japanese imperialists at that time, and other places.
					
					 Then they toured Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs before reaching Lake Samji. After being briefed on the Samjiyon Grand Monument, they went round the groups of sculptures of subsidiary theme and the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum and then the township of Samjiyon whose appearance has changed beyond recognition.
					
					 When they arrived at the Monument to Victory in Battles in Musan Area, they looked round the large group of sculptures in relievo of subsidiary theme with the bronze sculpture of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, the tower of a rifle, etc., being briefed on the monument and visited the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 They visited the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu, the holy site of revolution.
					
					 During the study tour, they conducted colorful political and cultural activities.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Observed
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean people and the progressives of the world are significantly celebrating the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (June 19, 1964).
					 The streets and residential quarters of Pyongyang are bedecked in colorful festive attire with words "Glory to The Great Leader Comrade    Kim Jong Il", "Celebration of June 19", "Revolutionary Party of Juche", "Great Leadership, Immortal Feats", "Steel-like Party, Invincible Party".
					
					 The flags of the Workers' Party of Korea are fluttering vigorously on the flagpoles in front of the People's Palace of Culture, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other monumental edifices and the flags of the DPRK and red banners are hung out here and there in the city, which is pervaded with best wishes of the army and people for leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 In celebration of the significant day, there were colorful functions including a national meeting, celebration gatherings, performance of a foreign dance troupe and public presentation of compositions of foreign students studying in the country. 
					
					 The progressive people around the world take this opportunity to pay best wishes to him with boundless respect and trust.
					
					 Seminars on his exploits, symposia, gatherings, book and photo exhibitions, film shows, introduction meetings and other celebration functions are being held in Russia, Mongolia, India, the Czech Republic, the Democratic Congo, Guinea, Cambodia, Romania, France, Ethiopia, Myanmar and various other countries.
					
					 Publications of Nepal, Mexico, Pakistan and other countries come out with special write-ups and articles. They extend highest respect and warmest congratulations to leader Kim Jong Il and emphasize that the last 45 years have been a history woven with heroic epic in which he, successfully carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung, has opened up a vigorous era of battles for defending socialism and efforts for building a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of Songun, and a history in which he has brought about a new era of Songun revolution. 
					
					The articles wish him good health, noting that the Workers' Party of Korea with him as its general secretary will in the future, too, demonstrate its invincible might.

articles.title: Forerunners Living Worthy Life
articles.content:
Forerunners Living Worthy Life
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A good many heroes of the time and persons of distinguished services in the Songun era are emerging in the new century in the DPRK as in the 70s, 80s and 90s of the last century.
					 Though they are engaged in different realms, some in factories and others in agriculture, scientific researches, health care or education, they are all living a worthy life without coming into repute, regarding what the Party and the leader want and intend as the goal and target of their life.
					
					 Jang Tu Il, a designer respected as a talented technician at the Chollima Steel Complex, has dedicated all his wisdom and zeal to the technical updating of steel production for 32 years, making a great contribution to the completion of the Korean-style UHP electric arc furnace last year.
					
					 Ju Pok Sun, manager of the Manpho Spinning Mill, devotedly defended the Party, the leader and socialism and boldly came up against difficulties, not remaining crestfallen or hibernating in the days of "Arduous March" and the forced march. Thus she face-lifted the mill inside and outside, so that it might preserve the very nature of socialism and taste of the Songun era. Meticulously planning the management of the mill, she broadly introduced new techniques and ran the mill on the basis of profitability to render an enormous profit to the country. 
					
					 Song Sun Ae, agitator of the Hero Excavator No.7 Workteam at the Ryongyang Mine, has greatly inspired the members to display mass heroism and collectivism, thus helping the workteam top the annual target every year over the last ten odd years since she left Pyongyang where she was born and settled down there.
					
					 Among the true forerunners of the time are An Jong Min who heralded an innovation in ore production, Kim Sa Myong who played a big role in building a modern pilot plant and updating production facilities of a machine factory in Korean style and Kim Kyong Su who devoted himself to refurbishing the branch school to compare favorably with the best ones and raising all the schoolchildren into reliable pillars of the country.
					
					 The number of the forerunners and persons of distinguished services are increasing day by day in the country under the warm care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who set store by even a small merit of workers, peasants and intellectuals and let it known widely.

articles.title: Immortal Feats Shining in History of Juche-oriented Party Building
articles.content:
Immortal Feats Shining in History of Juche-oriented Party Building
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Forty-five years have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in June Juche 53 (1964). During the years, he has published many works on Party construction and activities, thus performing immortal feats in the history of Juche-oriented Party building.
					 He authored famous works including "Let Us Make Party Work Through Work with People" in the 1960s. In the works, he set forth the idea and theory for developing and consolidating the WPK as the glorious Party of Comrade Kim Il Sung forever, strengthening the Party organizationally and ideologically and enhancing the leadership role of the Party in the revolution and construction in every way.
					
					 In the 1970s he published "Let Us Increase the Party's Fighting Efficiency and Bring about a Fresh Turn in the Building of Socialism" and other famous works to give perfect answers to the questions arising in strengthening the Party leadership over the socialist economic construction and improving the Party work system and method.
					
					 He attached great significance to boosting the leadership role and militant function of the Party as the general staff of the revolution to suit the requirements of the developing revolution in the 1980s and the early of the 1990s and gave clear-cut answers to all the questions arising in Party construction.
					
					 He issued the works "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU", "The Historical lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party", "Let Us further Consolidate the Position of the Socialist Revolution through Effective Party Work" and others. In the works he analyzed and reviewed in a scientific way the reason why socialism and ruling parties collapsed in various countries one after another and the historical lesson drawn from them and expounded original ideas and theories on questions including the issue of constantly strengthening the Party's leadership role over all sectors of the revolution and construction.
					
					 He made public various famous works including "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" in the middle of the 1990s when the U.S.-led imperialist reactionary forces were engaged in vicious moves, spreading the doctrine of "collapse" of the WPK and socialist system with the demise of President Kim Il Sung as an occasion. He, in the works, solemnly declared at home and abroad the revolutionary principle and firm stand of the WPK to carry out the socialist cause of Juche successfully.
					
					 In the periods of the "Arduous March" and the forced march when the DPRK had to undergo trials owing to the imperialists' vicious moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, he with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities clearly indicated the orientation and ways for accelerating the socialist construction powerfully by further enhancing the leadership role of the Party.
					
					 His famous works including "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction", "On Learning from the Revolutionary Soldier Spirit" and "Let Us Live not Merely for Today but for Tomorrow" put forward tasks and ways for firmly establishing Juche in the Party work and embodying the idea of love for the country, nation and people thoroughly in difficult and arduous times.
					
					 He worked out the unique Songun politics with a scientific penetration into the international circumstance of the Korean revolution and the change of political situation and the actual condition in which the anti-imperialist military front became the main front of the revolution and on his revolutionary philosophy that the army is precisely the Party, state and people. He published his famous works which serve as a guideline in developing and strengthening the WPK in accordance with its requirements. Among the works is "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					
					 His works also deal with the issues of enhancing the militant function and role of Party organizations at all levels in increasing the might of independent socialist national economy and improving the people's livelihood through the thorough implementation of the WPK's unique revolutionary economic strategy and the line of economic construction in the Songun era. 
					
					 In various famous works, he set forth tasks and ways for bringing about a revolutionary turn in the Party work to suit the requirement of the new century.
					
					 His works on Juche-based revolutionary Party building are an immortal great programme firmly guaranteeing the final victory of the independent cause of popular mass as they give scientific elucidation to the theoretical and practical issues arising in improving and strengthening the Party construction and activities in accordance with the requirement of the times and the historical circumstances in which the revolution and construction develop in depth.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Pro-U.S. Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Pro-U.S. Remarks Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, while inspecting the south Korean "Air Force Operational Command" recently, uttered that "cooperation" with the United States would help "deter" a war. This is nothing but brazen-faced sophism intended to evade the responsibility for having pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war by toeing the U.S. policy. 
					 Minju Joson Friday says this in its signed commentary.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that Lee has staged ceaseless large-scale war exercises targeted against the DPRK and pushed forward the moves for arms buildup in collusion with the U.S., crying out for "tightening alliance" with it from the day he came to power and has been busy with diplomacy to put additional "sanctions" upon the DPRK in "cooperation" with the U.S over the former's launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes. 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the group of traitors declared its full participation in the PSI, a mechanism for a war of aggression against the DPRK, which was cooked up by the U.S. against the DPRK, thus pushing the tense situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war. 
					
					 Such rhetoric about "cooperation" and "deterrent" let loose by the traitor is no more than a shameless jargon reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" It only brings to light the ulterior intention of Lee, a wicked sycophant and traitor and confrontation-minded maniac, to realize his ambition to invade the north in league with foreign forces. 
					
					 The same can be said of the call made by Lee Myung Bak for "close cooperation" with the U.S. while dining and winning with brass hats of the U.S. forces and their wives at the "Chongwadae". Lurking behind this is his sinister intention to cover up the true nature of the south Korea-U.S. "alliance", an alliance of aggression and war against the DPRK, and reinforce it. 
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than the calculation of Lee that he can gain something through such confab with the U.S. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will shatter in a twinkle the "alliance" with the U.S. and its promise of a "nuclear umbrella" on which Lee Myung Bak pins so big hope, the commentary warns.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Papers today dedicate editorials to the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun says his start of work at the C.C., the WPK was a historic event of the greatest significance as it provided a landmark of an epoch-making change in the struggle to strengthen the WPK and carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The history of his leadership over the revolution is an immortal history in which he has strengthened the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and the invincible revolutionary party steering the Songun revolutionary cause, an ever-victorious history in which he has firmly defended the country, the nation and the socialist cause with his unique Songun politics and a history of great creations and changes in which he has ushered in a brilliant heyday in building a great prosperous and powerful nation with the might of the single-minded unity of all the servicemen and people, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK has grown to be a militant party with the unitary idea and leadership fully ensured and strong in its organization and discipline, vanguard ranks of unshakable single-minded unity around its leader and an invincible party leading the revolution and construction to victory.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the Korean People's Army has grown strong to be a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu capable of beating back any enemy at a single stroke and the DPRK has displayed its might as a matchless military power as all its parts are pervaded with the traits of attaching importance to military affairs and its sky, land and seas are invulnerable. 
					
					 Under so difficult conditions the army and people of the DPRK have carried out in a big way such gigantic nature-harnessing projects as large-scale land realignment, gravity-fed waterway projects and power station construction and built many modern industrial establishments and production bases in different parts of the country. This is a shining fruition of the great patriotic Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il who is making a new history of great prosperity with the might of single-minded unity.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all people to dynamically advance under his Songun revolutionary leadership to open the gate to a thriving nation at an early date and brilliantly adorn with great victory of Korean-style socialism a-hundred-year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea shining with the Juche era.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different circles of south Korea called for firmly defending and thoroughly implementing the north-south joint declaration on June 15 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Civic and public organizations in Kwangju and South Jolla Province including the Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a "ceremony of observing the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration."
					
					 The participants in a declaration demanded the "government" make a policy switchover to reconciliation and cooperation based on the joint declaration.
					
					 The North Chungchong Provincial Headquarters of the above-said committee held a "ceremony and a lecture marking the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration" while the Taegu-North Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters and the Inchon Headquarters separately held press conferences demanding the authorities withdraw the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The North Chungchong Provincial Council of Christian Churches held a meeting to urge the "government" to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and diverse non-governmental cooperation and exchange.
					
					 The North Jolla Provincial Association of the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations held a similar event to review the reunification movement conducted after the publication of the joint declaration and urged the authorities to opt for implementing the joint declaration.

articles.title: Police Suppression of Patriotic Youth Assailed
articles.content:
Police Suppression of Patriotic Youth Assailed 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea made public a statement on June 13 denouncing the police for suppressing Ri Hui Chol, a pro-reunification patriotic young man, chairman of the 8th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils.
					 Recalling that the police authorities walked off Ri Hui Chol, the statement noted that he waged an indomitable struggle for independence, democracy and reunification though he was wanted by the police.
					
					 Terming the police suppression of him part of the moves of the dictatorial regime to stamp out democracy, the statement noted that the present situation can never be settled without forcing the present regime to step down.
					
					 The statement declared that the said solidarity would wage a dynamic struggle to have Ri Hui Chol released and punish the fascist dictatorial regime.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Denounce UNSC's Resolution
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Denounce UNSC's Resolution
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine, released a statement on June 15 denouncing the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted at the instigation of the U.S.
					 The statement accused the UNSC of adopting "Resolution 1874" over the DPRK's second nuclear test.
					
					 It is quite natural for anyone to take self-defensive measures in the event the sovereignty and dignity of one's country are threatened, the statement said, adding that intolerable are the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and its followers to force a country to fall victim to them for the mere reason that its ideology and system are different from theirs and it is small in its territory and population.
					
					 The statement noted that the confederation regarded all measures taken by the DPRK as just and aboveboard ones and fully supported them.
					
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, in his statement issued on June 17 denounced the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" as an act of wantonly violating the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and expressed his support to the statement of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs which solemnly declared that the DPRK would take counter-measures to defend the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country.
					
					The statement declared that the association would wage a more dynamic struggle to smash the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the DPRK and provoke a nuclear war against it, true to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions and Blockade against DPRK Opposed
articles.content:
U.S. Sanctions and Blockade against DPRK Opposed
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Canadian Peace Congress on June 5 issued a statement titled "The crisis of the Korean Peninsula calls for disarmament and solidarity against imperialism."
					 The congress urges the United States to immediately stop its aggressive and provocative sanctions and blockade against the DPRK and arms buildup, the statement said, referring in detail to the circumstances of occurrence of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and the essence of the issue and the criminal nature of the Lee Myung Bak group's full participation in the PSI.
					
					 Opposing either sanctions or blockade against the DPRK, the statement declared that the congress scathingly rejects the arms buildup and war exercises of the U.S. and its followers in and around the Korean Peninsula and south Korea's full participation in the PSI. 
					
					 It called for further strengthening international support and cooperation with the DPRK on the principle of respect for sovereignty and national right to self-determination.

articles.title: Anniversary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Syria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Syria
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee was inaugurated in Damascus on June 10 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The director of the Organizational Department of the Regional Leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful events including seminar, round-table talks, photo exhibition and film show until the Day of the Sun in 2012.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Sweden and a meeting, a book and photo exhibition and film shows in India between June 5 and 9 to commemorate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of the peerlessly great men and photos showing their revolutionary activities and books and photos introducing the Korean people's struggle.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were such Korean films as "Reply of Korea."
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Sweden.

articles.title: Ambas partes de Corea se reunen para enmendar contrato de la ZIK
articles.content:
Ambas partes de Corea se reunen para enmendar contrato de la ZIK
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el mismo terreno el contacto de trabajo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea para la enmienda del contrato de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK).
					 Este contacto fue preparado para normalizar la labor de la ZIK caida en la situacion muy dificil debido a las relaciones N-S cambiadas ultimamente, senalo primero la parte norcoreana.
					
					 Fustigo a la parte surcoreana que tan pronto como se diera el primer paso del presente contacto, decidio la participacion total en la supuesta "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI) lejos de tomar una posicion sincera en esa cita y seguidamente, se unio activamente a la "sancion".
					
					 Este comportamiento merece ser calificado de premeditada maniobra para negar hasta el trabajo de la ZIK, unico espacio de cooperacion entre ambas partes, y crear las dificultades en este contacto, subrayo.
					
					 Enfatizo que la parte surcoreana debe proceder con sinceridad a la labor de la ZIK y al contacto de trabajo por ella dejando de cometer las acciones que empeoren mas la situacion en contra del deseo y la aspiracion de la nacion.
					
					  En cuanto a la agenda de esta cita, la parte norcoreana recordo que en el anterior contacto, ella habia aclarado su posicion de principios relativa a las renegociaciones sobre las medidas preferenciales aplicadas en la ZIK y presento las propuestas detalladas relativas al arriendo de la tierra, el salario, el impuesto, etc.
					
					  Nuestras propuestas fueron planteadas tomando en cuenta los casos de las zonas economicas especiales de otros paises y del Sur de Corea, fundamentalmente, la importancia que tiene la ZIK por sus peculiaridades politicas, economicas y militares, aclaro.
					
					 Se puede decir que las autoridades surcoreanas son las mas beneficiarias de la ZIK en el plano politico, economico y militar, apunto.
					
					 Exigio a la parte surcoreana que acepte de positivos los problemas y las propuestas innovadoras de nuestra parte y coordine el criterio sobre los mismos si desea de veras el mantenimiento estable de la ZIK.
					
					 Acto seguido, hubo la intervencion de la parte surcoreana.
					
					 Nuestra parte critico a la parte Sur por obstaculizar y complicar el presente contacto presentando problemas desvinculados a la enmienda del contrato y por eludir su responsabilidad y deber.
					
					 Por ultimo, demando a la parte surcoreana proceder sinceramente al debate de la agenda adoptando la correcta posicion y actitud.
					
					 Ambas partes resolvieron sostener el proximo contacto el 2 de julio.

articles.title: Inmortales hazanas de Kim Jong Il en historia de construccion de PTC
articles.content:
Inmortales hazanas de Kim Jong Il en historia de construccion de PTC
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizo inmortales hazanas en la historia de la construccion del partido Juche por haber publicado numerosas obras relativas a la construccion y actividades del partido durante los 45 anos pasados desde cuando el inicio en junio del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche el trabajo en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  Al publicar en la decada de 1960 las obras maestras, entre otras, "Fortalezcamos y desarrollemos nuestro partido como eterno partido del camarada Kim Il Sung" y "Convirtamos estrictamente la labor partidista en la labor para con los hombres", presento la idea y teorias de desarrollar el PTC como glorioso partido eterno del Presidente Kim Il Sung y fortalecerlo en lo organico e ideologico y elevar por todos los medios el papel directivo del partido en la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  En la decada de 1970 hizo publicas las obras maestras como "Elevemos la combatividad del Partido para producir el nuevo viraje en la construccion socialista" y "Para destruir el viejo molde en el trabajo partidista y lograr nuevo viraje" iluminando perfectamente los problemas de fortalecer la direccion partidista sobre la construccion de la economia socialista y mejorar el sistema y el metodo del trabajo partidista.   
					
					　En la decada de 1980 y a principios de la decada de 1990, concedio un gran significado a la labor para elevar el papel directivo y la facultad combativa del partido como Estado Mayor de la revolucion conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo dio claras respuestas a todos los problemas que se presentan en la construccion del partido.
					
					  En las obras "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea es un partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano, heredero de las gloriosas tradiciones de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo", "Lecciones historicas de la construccion socialista y la linea general de nuestro partido", "Hagamos bien la labor partidista para consolidar con  mas firmeza la base de la revolucion socialista", etc.  hizo analisis y balance cientificos de la causa y la leccion historica de que se derrumbaron uno tras otro el socialismo y los partidos en el Poder en varios paises e ilumino las originales ideas y teorias incluyendo el problema de elevar incesantemente el papel directivo del partido en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  A mediados de la decada de 1990 cuando el pueblo coreano sufrio el gran duelo nacional, las fuerzas reaccionarias imperialistas acaudilladas por EE.UU. maniobraban perversamente difundiendo el "rumor del derrumbe" del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el regimen socialista, el Dirigente publico varias obras como "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea es el partido del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung" y "Priorizar la labor ideologica es requisito indispensable para el cumplimiento de la causa socialista", en las cuales declaro solemnemente al interior y exterior del pais los principios revolucionarios y la posicion firme del PTC para llevar a  feliz termino la causa socialista del Juche.
					
					  En el periodo de la "marcha penosa" y la forzada cuando la RPDC sufria las pruebas debido a perversas maniobras de los imperialistas para aislarla y aplastarla, el Dirigente libro dinamicas actividades ideo-teoricas iluminando con claridad el rumbo y los medios para acelerar con vigor la construccion socialista elevando mas el papel directivo del partido.
					
					  "Para mantener el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad en el proceso revolucionario y constructivo", "Para aprender el espiritu revolucionario de los militares", "llevemos la vida no para hoy sino para manana" y otras obras iluminan las tareas para establecer con firmeza el Juche en la labor partidista y materializar la idea de amor por la patria, la nacion y el pueblo cada vez que el periodo se tornaba mas dificil y arduo.
					
					 Al percatarse de manera cientifica las circunstancias internacionales de la revolucion coreana, la tendencia de la situacion y las condiciones realistas en que el  frente militar antiimperialista se ha convertido en el frente principal de la revolucion, el Dirigente expuso la filosofia revolucionaria segun la cual el ejercito es precisamente el partido, el Estado y el pueblo.
					
					  A base de eso practico la original politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) y publico las obras "La linea revolucionaria del Sogun es la gran linea revolucionaria de nuestra epoca y la bandera invencible de nuestra revolucion" y "La politica de Songun de nuestro partido es el poderoso modo politico socialista" que sirven de guia para fortalecer el PTC conforme a su demanda. 
					
					  La obra "Intensifiquemos mas el poderio socialista concentrando las fuerzas al trabajo partidista y el economico" y otras iluminan las ideas de elevar la funcion combativa y el papel de las organizaciones del partido a todos los niveles en fortalecer el poderio de la economia nacional independiente socialista y mejorar la vida del pueblo mediante la materializacion estricta de la estrategia economica revolucionaria original y la linea de construccion economica de la epoca del Songun presentadas por el PTC.
					
					  Tambien, en las obras "Hagamos del presente un ano de viraje en abrir el camino de avance del nuevo siglo" y "Elevemos mas el papel de los funcionarios de propaganda de base del partido conforme a la demanda del avance revolucionario del nuevo siglo" y otras ilumino las tareas y los medios para traer el cambio revolucionario en la labor partidista de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					  Las obras maestras del Dirigente sobre la construccion del partido revolucionario del Juche dan las respuestas cientificas a los problemas teorico-practicos que se presentan para mejorar y fortalecer la construccion y las actividades del partido con arreglo al ambiente historico y la demanda de la epoca en que se profundizan y se desarrollan la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  Por lo tanto, las obras sirven del inmortal programa que garantiza con certeza  la victoria final de la causa independiente de las masas populares.

articles.title: Inaugurado campeonato nacional de Taekwo-Do por Copa Jongilbong
articles.content:
Inaugurado campeonato nacional de Taekwo-Do por Copa Jongilbong
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 19 en el Palacio de Taekwon-Do el XII campeonato nacional de Taekwon-Do por la Copa Jongilbong.
					    En el certamen participan mas de 700 jugadores seleccionados en mas de 10 unidades, entre ellas, los equipos de Taekwon-Do, los palacios y casas de escolares y ninos y ellos se disputaran en las disciplinas de Taekwon-Do, Paduk (Go-chess) y Sirum (lucha tradicional de Corea).
					
					  El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del presidente del Comite Coreano de Taekwon-Do, Hwang Pong Yong, quien senalo que todos los jugadores deben poner de pleno manifiesto en el presente campeonato la elevada potencia espiritual y la alta tecnica ejercitada en tiempo ordinario, obtener buenos exitos y contribuir al desarrollo de la habilidad del arte marcial del pais.
					
					  En el acto, participo el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de la opera revolucionaria "La Florista"
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de la opera revolucionaria "La Florista"
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 45o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang la funcion de la opera revolucionaria "La Florista".
					Esta opera, que adapto la clasica obra maestra de igual nombre creada y llevada a la escena en la decada de 1930, sirve de manual de lucha y vida para los revolucionarios y constituye la pieza monumental que es considerada como eterno patrimonio cultural de la humanidad.
					
					A traves de la diestra interpretacion artistica, los ejecutantes ensenan mediante el destino de Kotbun y sus familiares la verdad de la revolucion de que no se puede salvar con lagrimas y compasion el destino nacional ni el familiar ni el de si misma y no hay otro remedio que luchar con los enemigos de clase.
					
					La disfrutaron los cuadros del Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores capitalinos.
